scripts.robot: npm run setupStatic; npm run harvestCss; npm run importGameImages; npm run importNewsImages; npm run importAboutImages; npm run encodeImages; npm run makeGamePayloads; npm run exportAllGamePayloads
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist; mkdir dist; rm -rf node_modules/.cache/storybook
scripts.setupStatic: rm -rf dist; mkdir dist; mkdir dist/static; cp -a ./public/. ./dist/static/.;
scripts.build-storybook: npm run robot; rm -rf dist/storybook; build-storybook -c .storybook -o dist/storybook
scripts.publish-storybook: cd dist/storybook; rm -rf .git; git init; git remote add origin git@github.com:krawaller/chessicals-storybook.git; git checkout -b gh-pages; git add .; git commit -m 'payload'; git push origin gh-pages; rm -rf .git;
scripts.postinstall: rm -rf node_modules/react; rm -rf node_modules/react-dom; rm -rf node_modules/@types/react
